articles.author: Sky
articles.description: The government will give £2.8m towards a bid by England, Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland and Ireland to host the 2030 World Cup.
articles.title: PM offers Britain's stadiums for all of the European Championship with eyes on 2030 World Cup bid - Sky News

articles.author: Kalyeena Makortoff
articles.content: City firms revealed in the final months of 2020 that they planned to shift nearly £100bn in assets to the EU, taking the total value of assets lost to the bloc since the Brexit vote to £1.3 trillion,… [+2160 chars]
articles.description: Data from EY highlights last-minute transfers in order to hold on to European business
articles.title: City firms made plans in Brexit run-up to move assets worth £100bn to EU – survey - The Guardian

articles.content: (Reuters) - Tottenham Hotspur's Europa League round-of-16 first and second- leg matches against Croatian side Dinamo Zagreb have been reversed due to a clash with north London rivals Arsenal, Europea… [+882 chars]
articles.description: (Reuters) -     Tottenham Hotspur's Europa League round-of-16 first and second- leg matches against Croatian side Dinamo Zagreb have been reversed due to a clash with north London rivals Arsenal, European soccer's governing body UEFA said on Monday.
articles.title: Tottenham's Europa last-16 games with Dinamo Zagreb reversed - The Star Online
